artist: Artist: Circle of Giovanni Battista Piranesi
creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: interior view of a set of columns (up stairs?); darker columns closer to the viewer framed by an arched opening at top (verso is not visible with current framing package)
medium: Pen and brown ink over black chalk with gray wash on paper
title: Study of a Colonnade from below (recto); Study of a Pedestal with a Broken Column (verso)
